inputDescriptors.name: Execute on behalf of (OBO) users
inputDescriptors.description: Use credentials of deployment submitter or approver for execution. Service principal stored with the endpoint is used for read only operations.

inputDescriptors.name: Creation Mode
inputDescriptors.description: Endpoint creation can be Automatic or Manual.

inputDescriptors.description: Id for contributor role in Azure subscription.

inputDescriptors.name: Azure permissions
inputDescriptors.description: Serialized list of azure permissions.

inputDescriptors.name: Service Principal Object Id
inputDescriptors.description: Id  for service principal object in Azure Active Directory.

inputDescriptors.name: Application Object Id
inputDescriptors.description: Id for application object in Azure Active Directory.

inputDescriptors.name: Access Token
inputDescriptors.description: Access token to be used for creating the service principal

inputDescriptors.name: Role
inputDescriptors.description: Role to be assigned to the service principal

inputDescriptors.name: Scope
inputDescriptors.description: Scope on which the role should be assigned to the service principal

inputDescriptors.name: Service Principal Id
inputDescriptors.description: Client Id for connecting to the endpoint. Refer to link on how to create Azure Service Principal.

inputDescriptors.name: Service Principal Key
inputDescriptors.description: Service Principal Key for connecting to the endpoint. Refer to link on how to create Azure Service Principal.

inputDescriptors.name: Tenant Id
inputDescriptors.description: Tenant Id for connecting to the endpoint. Refer to link on how to create Azure Service Principal.

value.name: azurerm
value.description: Service Endpoint type for Azure Resource Manager connections
value.helpMarkDown: For Service Principal: refer to link. Learn More

inputDescriptors.name: Server Certificate Thumbprint
inputDescriptors.description: The thumbprint of the cluster's certificate. This is used to verify the identity of the cluster. This value overrides the publish profile.

inputDescriptors.name: Client Certificate
inputDescriptors.description:
Base64 encoding of the cluster's client certificate file.

You can use the following PowerShell script to obtain a Base64-encoded representation of a certificate:
[System.Convert]::ToBase64String([System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes("C:\path\to\certificate.pfx"))

inputDescriptors.name: Password
inputDescriptors.description: Password for the certificate.

inputDescriptors.name: Server Certificate Thumbprint
inputDescriptors.description: The thumbprint of the cluster's certificate. This is used to verify the identity of the cluster. This value overrides the publish profile.

inputDescriptors.description: Password for the Azure Active Directory account.

inputDescriptors.name: Use windows security
inputDescriptors.description: Connect to a secure cluster using windows security. Learn more.

inputDescriptors.name: Cluster SPN
inputDescriptors.description: Fully qualified domain SPN for gMSA account. This is applicable only if "Use windows security" option is enabled. Refer here.
